author: lmartin
msg: Changed the way in which attributes and data type validators are looked up in the start and end element calls.  This mimics what we do in xerces-1, but may need to be revisited (may not be complete)

author: lmartin
msg: Changed matcher start and end element calls to take element decls as arguments

author: lmartin
msg: 1. Changed startDocumentFragment to remove context arg - it wasn't used, and resulted in the method not being reached by the validator. 2. Changed start and end element calls to take an element decl, instead of a schema grammar

author: lmartin
msg: changed comparison for id constr. node names to use string comparison.   Reference comparisons don't always work - Sandy investigating

author: lmartin
msg: consistently use empty string for prefix and null for uri when absent
